snippet.title: The Big Red Adventure (1995)
snippet.description:
The Big Red Adventure is a PC adventure game created in 1995 by Paolo Costabel for Dynabyte and published by Core Design.

The story begins in Moscow, Russia. You play as Doug - an international thief who robs museum treasures for a living.
